title: Greatclub
content:
Greatclub Common 1~8 Damage 1d8 Bludgeoning Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Traces of dried viscera ring many of the iron spikes embedded in this oak club. Greatclub Two-Handed 4.5 16

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
